name: Merge fun cars: Parking games
description:
Get a fun from this super addictive absurd car games.
Feel like a mad parking supervisor in a crazy merge world.

- combine the same cars in a more advanced.
- ran unique physics of collisions!
- collect coins to open new play areas!
- score points and beat records to become king of top.

This game is for those who love race car games, as well as parking games, rac and ran.
Enjoy addictive games fun and great absurd visual effects.

Merge me my friend!
